---
title: "`r fam`"
description: "`r subtitle`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, error = FALSE, results = "asis")
```


```{r}

# fixing empty or broken image links
url <- page_data$url_loc
for (i in 1:length(url)) {
  if (!file.exists(url[i]) | url[i] == "") {
    url[i] <- "./img/no-image.png"
  }
}
page_data$url_loc <- url


if (fam_page & length(subgrps) > 1) {
  subgrps <- subgrps[subgrps != ""]
  if(fam != "Rockfishes") page_data$color_cat <- NA
  # makes page with links to groups of species based on the subgroup column
  tabl <- page_data %>%
    group_by(subgroup) %>%
    mutate(n = 1:n()) %>%
    filter(n == 1 | subgroup == "") %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(rowid = 1:n(), 
           has_group = ifelse(subgroup == "", 0, 1)) %>% #hacky thing to make sure subpages are numbered correctly
    group_by(has_group) %>%
    mutate(spg_id = 1:n()) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(
      species_page = case_when(
        group == "Rockfishes" & fp == TRUE ~ paste0("zz_", group_title, "_",  str_remove(tolower(color_cat), "/"), ".html"),
        group == "Rockfishes" & fp == FALSE ~ paste0("zz_", group_title, "_", str_remove(tolower(color_cat), "/"), "_subpage_", spg_id, ".html"),
        TRUE ~ paste0("./zz_", group_title, "_subpage", rowid, ".html")
      ),                                 
      img = paste0("![](", url_loc, ")"),
      descrip = ifelse(subgroup == "",
        paste0(
          "<br>[*", species, "*](zz_", group_title, "_", gsub(" ", "_", species), ".html)<br>",
          str_to_title(common_name), "<br>"),
        paste0("<br>[**", str_to_title(subgroup), "**](", species_page, ")")
      )
    ) %>%
    arrange(desc(subgroup)) %>%
    select(img, descrip)
} else {  #makes page with links to species pages
  tabl <- page_data %>%
    group_by(species) %>%
    mutate(n = 1:n()) %>%
    filter(n == 1) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    mutate(
      species_page = paste0("./zz_", group_title, "_", gsub(" ", "_", species), ".html"),
      img = paste0("![](", url_loc, ")"),
      descrip = paste0(
        "<br>[*", species, "*](", species_page, ")<br>",
        str_to_title(common_name), "<br>",
        species_code
      )
    ) %>%
    arrange(subgroup) %>%
    select(img, descrip)
}


nr <- nrow(tabl)
if (nr > 8 | nr %% 2 != 0 & nr > 4) ncols <- 3 else ncols <- 2


  if (nr == 1) {
    colnms <- ""
  } else {
    colnms <- rep("", ncols)
  }

img_px <- 700 / ncols

tabl %>%
  mutate(
    pic = paste0(img, "{width=", img_px, "px}", descrip),
    col = rep(1:ncols, n())[1:n()],
    row = rep(1:n(), each = ncols)[1:n()]
  ) %>%
  select(pic, col, row) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = col, values_from = pic) %>%
  select(-row) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), "") %>%
  kable(
    escape = FALSE, col.names = colnms,
    align = rep("c", ncols)
  ) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = T)

back <- paste0("[Back to ID Home](./species_id_id_by_taxa.html)")
```
